mapper.select: select count(1) from yf_company t inner join yf_classifyinfo a on t.fId = a.id inner join yf_classifyinfo b on t.sId = b.id inner join yf_classifyinfo c on t.tId = c.id inner join yf_classifyinfo d on t.cId = d.id inner join zlzt_datainfo m on t.dataId = m.id
mapper.update:
update yf_company t inner join zlzt_datainfo m on t.dataId = m.id
t.cId = #{cId},
t.fId = #{fId},
t.sId = #{sId},
t.tId = #{tId},
m.country = #{country},
m.openId = #{openId},
m.openDay = #{openDay},
m.applyId = #{applyId},
m.applyDay = #{applyDay},
m.title = #{title},
m.titleFy = #{titleFy},
m.zy = #{zy},
m.zyFy = #{zyFy},
m.powerAsk = #{powerAsk},
m.powerAFy = #{powerAFy},
powerAN = #{powerAN},
m.applyMan = #{applyMan},
m.applyPlace = #{applyPlace},
m.createMan = #{createMan},
m.lawS = #{lawS},
m.nowLawS = #{nowLawS},
m.zlType = #{zlType},
m.ipcMC = #{ipcMC},
m.ipcMCFy = #{ipcMCFy},
m.ipc = #{ipc},
m.ipcFy = #{ipcFy},
m.cpec = #{cpec},
m.cpecFy = #{cpecFy},
m.beUsedNum = #{beUsedNum},
m.value = #{value},
m.zlImage = #{zlImage},
m.zlText = #{zlText},
m.homeImage = #{homeImage},
m.updateTime = #{updateTime},
where t.id = #{id}
